All console games sold by UK retailers are designed for a PAL consoles.

PAL region consists of UK and parts of Asia. 

Now, if you are in Canada or American (USA), you are in the NTSC region. To download this game for American and Canadians, please go to this : http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5895089/Naruto_Shippuden_Ultimate_Ninja_Storm_2_NTSC_U_J

Hope this helped, for more info on PAL and NTSC, visit : http://www.xbreporter.com/xbox_pal_ntsc.php 

or use google.

Good day to all. :]
By the way, this one works. I downloaded and everything worked, however I'm in Canada so it said the region code is wrong. :] Read my post above for more info on PAL and NTSC stuff.
